name: Kaizemo
description:
A short 2d platformer where you make cool moves using only a few elements.

🕹️ Controls:
  • 'A' and 'D' to move.
  • Space to jump.
  • Arrow keys to throw or dive.
📕 Story:

He is in his dream world and he loves it, but he needs to make moves so he doesn't wake up.

❕ Issues:
  • Last level  has weird starting position.

Comment if you found other issues.

Source code is available here on my github.

Mit Bravour gemeisterte Herausforderungen:

- 🤐Ohne Worte

- ✊ Rebellion
